alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 4:01AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches with locally higher totals in the mountains. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Western Millard and Juab Counties, Eastern Juab/Millard Counties, Central Mountains and Sanpete Valley. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult along all area roads including I-70 and I-15. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread heavy snow is expected along a cold front Monday. Be prepared for winter driving conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
